lemma "\<forall>p \<in> dom \<Gamma>. \<forall>Z. \<Gamma>,{} \<turnstile>\<^sub>t\<^bsub>/F\<^esub> {s. s=Z \<and> \<Gamma>\<turnstile>\<langle>Call p,Normal s\<rangle> \<Rightarrow>\<notin>({Stuck} \<union> Fault ` (-F)) \<and> \<Gamma>\<turnstile>(Call p)\<down>Normal s} (Call p) {t. \<Gamma>\<turnstile>\<langle>Call p,Normal Z\<rangle> \<Rightarrow> Normal t}, {t. \<Gamma>\<turnstile>\<langle>Call p,Normal Z\<rangle> \<Rightarrow> Abrupt t}"
